name: Magictip
body:
## Welcome to Magictip Plugin Pages #### With Magictip, we can see the information displayed outside the site when we mouse pointer on an element. The ```mouseover``` will appear when the mouse hover in, and disappear when the mouse hover out with ```mouseout```. This is a useful plugin for newspaper or story... Magictip is designed to be simple to implement with easily-accessed configuration options and visual styling handled entirely via CSS. ## Getting Started ### Markup #### You have to add the rel = "magictip" on all the``` ``` where you want the effect. #### To use Magictip, include the following code in your page: ``` ``` ####MagicTip will find the ```

``` tag #### If you want you can change the color, the width. Watch the example. ``` ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
